    CLI --> ConfigL & ImageL
    ConfigL --> ConfigP
    ImageL -->|BGR| Detection
    
    CircleD -->|Standard Mode| ColorExt

    HistC --> ColorPal
    
    ColorExt --> ColorClust
    BlackV --> ConvexD
    CMYKAcc --> Render

    GPURend --> CircleR
